thread.section_title: Off to Neverland Travel - Disney Vacations
thread.title: Late Summer 2015 Disneyland® Resort Savings

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Late Summer 2015 Disneyland® Resort Savings
text:
Late Summer 2015 Disneyland® Resort Savings Be dazzled by savings! 
The Disneyland® Resort Diamond Celebration is in full swing – celebrating 60 spectacular years since the opening of the Disneyland® Park! And now, you can save on your upcoming stay at Disney’s Grand Californian Hotel ® & Spa or the Disneyland ® Hotel! Save up to 20% on select Premium rooms at Disney’s Grand Californian Hotel ® & Spa or the Disneyland ® Hotel on most weekday stays (Sun.–Thu.) between 8/16 – 9/24/2015 
Booking Dates: Book now – Sep. 3, 2015 
Travel Dates: Stays most Sun. – Thu. nights Aug/ 16 – Sep. 24 with travel completed by Sep. 25, 2015. Some blockout dates apply. 
Savings based on the non-discounted price for the same room at the same hotel for most Sun. – Thu. nights. Valid for travel between 8/16 – 9/24/15. Book from 7/15 – 9/3/15, with travel completed by 9/25/15. Savings on Premium rooms are available on Premium, Deluxe and Woods/Garden/Courtyard rooms; select Concierge rooms; and Paradise, Artisan and Regal Suites. Savings on other hotels and room types may be available. Not valid on previously booked rooms. Advance reservations required. Subject to availability as the number of rooms allocated for this offer is limited. Excludes applicable fees and taxes. Limit two (2) rooms per reservation and five (5) people maximum per room. Not valid in combination with any other hotel discounts or offers. Subject to restrictions and change without notice. Separate Theme Park admission required to enjoy the Parks.
